gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem

Class Predicate

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem.AbstractTerm
      • gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem.Predicate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SemanticItem, Term, java.lang.Comparable<SemanticItem>

    public class Predicate
extends AbstractTerm
    Implementation of an atomic term that corresponds to a relation indicator.

    It is similar to Entity, but its ontological status is different from an entity term, in that most ontologies would not encode predicates. The relation between a Predicate and Indicator is similar to one between an Entity and a set of Concepts.

    Predicates are generally taken to be verbs, nominalizations, and adjectives, but we are trying to be more general here, even though specific pieces of the code may make different assumptions about predicates.

    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

      • getSemtypes

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSemtypes()
        Finds the active semantic type (i.e., associated with the "sense").

        Returns the term type if no sense is selected. Returns a set to conform to interface definition.

        Returns:
        the active semantic type

      • getAllSemtypes

        public java.util.LinkedHashSet<java.lang.String> getAllSemtypes()
        Finds all semantic types associated with the indicator. Returns the term type if no indicator is associated with the term.
        Returns:
        all semantic types

      • getAssociatedSense

        public Sense getAssociatedSense()
        Finds the active sense of the predicate.

        If no indicator is associated with this predicate, the method will return null. If there is an indicator but no sense is selected, it will attempt to find the sense using the type.

        Returns:
        the active sense, null if no indicator is associated with the term

      • getScopeType

        public Sense.ScopeType getScopeType()
        Gets the scope type associated with the current sense.
        Returns:
        the scope type (NARROW, WIDE, or DEFAULT).

      • getOntology

        public Ontology getOntology()
        Description copied from interface: SemanticItem
        Gets the ontological information associated with the semantic item. This is an abstract Indicator in the case of a Predicate, and a Concept in the case of an Entity.
        Returns:
        the abstract ontological information (no spans) associated with the semantic item
